Item ID12498

Bandos bracers are a piece of Bandos blessed dragonhide armour. At least 70 Ranged is required to wear these bracers.

Along with other blessed dragonhide armour pieces, it cannot be made using the Crafting skill. Players can receive them as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

This item does give Bandosian protection within the God Wars Dungeon.

[[File:Bandos bracers detail.png|left|180px]]
'''Bandos bracers''' are a piece of [[Bandos blessed dragonhide armour]]. At least 70 [[Ranged]] is required to wear these bracers.

Along with other [[blessed dragonhide armour]] pieces, it '''cannot''' be made using the [[Crafting]] skill. Players can receive them as a reward from completing [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]].

This item '''does''' give [[God Wars Dungeon#God%20equipment|Bandosian protection]] within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
